languages.text: {n}Скрежетнув когтями по полу, падший воин яростно скрипит:{/n} "Неприемлемо! Скверна преходящей жизни должна быть подвергнута эрадикации!"
{n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The rot of transient life must be eradicated!"
languages.original_text: {n}Скрежетнув когтями по полу, падший воин яростно скрипит:{/n} "Неприемлемо! Скверна преходящей жизни должна быть подвергнута эрадикации!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The corruption of ephemeral life must be eradicated!"

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier vaincu gratte le sol de ses griffes et hurle avec fureur :{/n} « C'est inacceptable ! La pourriture de la vie éphémère doit être éradiquée ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The rot of transient life must be eradicated!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier vaincu gratte le sol de ses griffes et hurle avec fureur :{/n} « C'est inacceptable ! Le vice de la vie éphémère doit être éradiqué ! »

languages.text: {n}El guerrero caído araña el suelo con sus garras y chirría con furia:{/n} «¡Esto es inaceptable! ¡La podredumbre de la vida pasajera ha de ser erradicada!».
languages.original_text: {n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The rot of transient life must be eradicated!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero caído araña el suelo con sus garras y grita con furia:{/n} «¡Esto es inaceptable! ¡El albedrío de la vida pasajera ha de ser erradicado!».

languages.text: {n}倒在地上的战士用利爪划着地板，愤怒地尖叫着。{/n}“不可接受！短暂的生命属于腐败之物，必须根除！”
languages.original_text: {n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The rot of transient life must be eradicated!"

traits.locale_text: {n}倒在地上的战士用利爪划着地板，愤怒地尖叫着。{/n}“不可接受！短暂的生命属于邪恶之物，必须根除！”

languages.text: {n}倒れた戦士は爪で床を引っかき、激昂の叫びをあげる。{/n}「あり得ぬ！儚き生命の腐敗は、根絶されねばならぬのだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The rot of transient life must be eradicated!"

traits.locale_text: {n}倒れた戦士は爪で床を引っかき、激昂の叫びをあげる。{/n}「あり得ぬ！儚き生命の腐敗は、根絶されねばならぬのだ！」

languages.text: {n}Der gefallene Krieger kratzt mit seinen Klauen über den Boden und kreischt zornig:{/n} "Inakzeptabel! Die Fäulnis des flüchtigen Lebens muss ausgelöscht werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The rot of transient life must be eradicated!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gefallene Krieger kratzt mit seinen Klauen über den Boden und kreischt zornig:{/n} "Inakzeptabel! Das Laster des flüchtigen Lebens muss ausgelöscht werden!"

languages.text: {n}Düşen savaşçı, tırnaklarıyla zemini kazıyarak öfkeyle cırlıyor.{/n} "Kabul edilemez! Fâni yaşamın pisliği ortadan kaldırılmalı!"
languages.original_text: {n}The fallen warrior scrapes the floor with his claws and screeches furiously,{/n} "Unacceptable! The rot of transient life must be eradicated!"
